title: Dr Strange Ryze skin 3250 Rp
body: I just finished watching Dr Strange and i loved it and i was thinking that ryze could pull off a skin losely based on dr strange, now i would suggest that blue particles be changed to orange for a nice effect and feel, but this is spitballing, so far the only staple idea i have is that the visual on ryzes ult changes to have and orang sparkler type circle on the outside with the centre showing the location that the portal is going to teleport to, i mean it could only be an 1820 skin but i think it could work, and a nice visual effect on the ult wouldnt feel too bad
